channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The all-electric Jeep Recon is finally here
item.description: The Jeep Recon, an all-electric SUV with an estimated 250 miles of range, is here, and I couldn’t be more surprised. Here’s why. Three years ago, Jeep...

item.title: Emm raises $9M seed to create one of the world’s first ‘smart’ menstrual cups
item.description: On Wednesday, Emm, based in the UK, announced a $9 million seed (£6.8 million) round led by Lunar Ventures as it prepares to officially launch the sma...

item.title: Trump DOE gives Microsoft partner $1B loan to restart Three Mile Island reactor
item.description: Constellation Energy will use the loan to refurbish a reactor it idled in 2019. Microsoft has agreed to buy the power once the facility reopens in 202...

item.title: TikTok will now give you badges for limiting your doomscrolling
item.description: TikTok is adding new digital wellbeing tools like an affirmation journal, a background sound generator, and badges for using the app within limits

item.title: TikTok now lets you choose how much AI-generated content you want to see
item.description: With the new AI-generated content control, users who want to see less of this sort of content can dial things down, while those who enjoy it can choos...

item.title: Meta wins antitrust trial as judge denies that it’s a monopoly
item.description: A federal judge ruled that Meta is not a monopoly in a lawsuit with the FTC.

item.title: AI data center provider Lambda raises whopping $1.5B after multibillion-dollar Microsoft deal
item.description: Lambda's new raise was a solid beat over the amount that deal-watchers say it was hoping to hit.

item.title: The Best Delivery Thanksgiving Meal Kits (2025)
item.description: Thanksgiving can be daunting. Meal kit boxes from Sunbasket and Blue Apron offer the satisfaction of making a home-cooked feast with a lot less stress...

item.title: Monarch Tractor sued over tractors that were ‘unable to operate autonomously’
item.description: Burks Tractor, a dealership located in Idaho, has sued Monarch for breach of contract and allegedly violating its warranty because the California-base...

item.title: Hugging Face CEO says we’re in an ‘LLM bubble,’ not an AI bubble
item.description: Hugging Face co-founder and CEO Clem Delangue says all the attention is on LLMs, but smaller, specialized models will make sense in many use cases goi...
